channel.title: News on particl3s.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in News on particl3s.xyz

item.title: Obsolete
item.description: Since the latest edition support has been discontinued for older pc. The software no longer supports my age old machine. As a new direction I’ll be working on animation on a regular basis from now on, back to basics.

item.title: Jingle Jangle Trolly
item.description: It’s that time of the year again, eggnog and carols. It’s so fun that it’s right after Halloween and we can still be jolly and have plastic trees. Some people really hate the winter season.

item.title: Alumnae
item.description: There was a volunteer thing on the world wide web on the look out for artists. We’ve been at a Theatre for a few months painting a mural, it was a really cool experience. We saw a show go live and listened to actors rehearsing. Everybody is super nice and I’m going to miss the place & people.

item.title: LoD
item.description: Lord of Dice was a mobile card strategy game, I haven’t played it in years but it was brought up in a conversation on the internet. There’s hardly any youtube videos about it and the .apk is hard to find. Nor is there enough space on my mobile device to use it. It’s sort of in a tie with how much time it takes where it equals Ragnarok Online. Some of my best memories are mmorpgs.

item.title: Distro
item.description: There’s a few rig releases in the works, enjoy!

item.title: Distro
item.description: My oh my the last month has been busy, a lot less sleep and worthwhile drawing. In the midsts of that ended up having a operating system burn out. Not to worry though, it’s been replaced. Now it’s on a Debian based system without any integration issue. My first one actually, rather fascinating moving from an Aur base to something else.

item.title: Chroma Corps
item.description: Our pal Sinix is hosting Chroma Corps again this year, a world building exercise for a mech academy. All cadets are live ==> https://youtu.be/aH7fZ-iBZqk

item.title: Drawpile
item.description: There’s a new release of Drawpile out as of three days ago, a free collaborative online drawing platform. https://drawpile.net

item.title: Corrupted Hard Drive
item.description: A decade old external hard drive went skynet yesterday and lost hundreds of gigabityes of data. No biggie since backups of backups are commonplace now. Everything is fine and the HD has been formatted to exFat which has no file size limit. Remember to do thorough backups!

item.title: Suzume No Tojimari
item.description: Currently the movie so aptly named Suzume No Tojimari is playing in my whereabouts and I had the fortune to view it in a theatre. To my thoughts it was going to be only a few people, anime weebs with asthma and myself. As it turns out the venue was packed and in hindsight all the better for it. It was funny, heartwarming, depressing and much, much more. If you get a chance to see it on a large screen it gets thumbs up for any anime fan.

item.title: Spring
item.description: There’s a flutter of noises from animals mingling, plants are growing and rain replaces snow. It’s a great time to homestead & eat lots.

item.title: Heart of Winter
item.description: It just got really cold here, had the sniffles for a few days.

item.title: Another Cowl
item.description: Infinity Wars the Card Game had another successful kickstarter. To learn more about its revival visit Link in post.

item.title: Normie Tier
item.description: Back to reality.

item.title: Frostbite
item.description: Locked myself in for the past month for new years, it was great. Just an all around healing and sleeping and eating awesome time as temperatures dropped 20 below 0 celsius.

item.title: Ēostre
item.description: Slumber.

item.title: N.Y Resolution
item.description: Digitise all vinyl in storage.

item.title: First Snow
item.description: It’s weird when December hits and no snow in sight, no jingle bell or story to tell. Eggnog though, liquid ice cream. Have a nice festive season!

item.title: Yule time
item.description: Pass the pudding please, never get enough of sourdough rye in the wool. Holden bottleneck swept up by the wear sunscreen.

item.title: Hangar
item.description: Saw some squeegy kids cleaning windows in a place, an apartment complex on a visit to the city. Living on the outskirts makes a world of difference, remembering the night life and how different it is to be awake without sun for years.

item.title: 毒薬
item.description: Easy fallen vertigo; virtuous blight, but not without temper that once stood so still.

item.title: Farewell
item.description: After using KDE desktop environment for a few years I have overwrote the OS with Openbox. A messy few days though not a bad breakup, happy Halloween!

item.title: Infinity Wars Classic
item.description: A kickstarter just ended for one of my all time favourite card games. Link is in the post, may the triforce be with you.

item.title: Phonograph
item.description: All’s turpentine, black as soot. Sombre bellows sirens speaks, from birch to birch then again.

item.title: Chokeberries & Acorns
item.description: Gonna work towards scripts and storyboards to wittle down time, efficiency and pipeline.

item.title: End of Summer
item.description: Time to be a cake-a-holic, can’t wait for cheese cake during winter. The trees have started turning colour and a bunch are still growing berries.

item.title: Humidity
item.description: It’s been sunny around this time of year, food shortages are about to happen. Stock up on supply unless the whole starving artist thing is in.

item.title: Upload
item.description: There’s been some rigs added to the repo, all are compatible with 2.8x and up. Please check ‘em out!

item.title: Chromarinara
item.description: Chroma Corps 2022 has started –> Link

item.title: Highway of Information
item.description: The network was down yesterday for a day, really brings life into perspective. People connected to the web 24/7 must have a tough time staying grounded.

item.title: Battery
item.description: Bought a used solar cell, small and portable. Also saw a dead rodent earlier, under a bridge.

item.title: Slice of Life
item.description: User interface is sorely off in much of open source, same with backwards compatibility. Jamming a Snes cartridge into a n64.

item.title: Candles
item.description: Since electric outages are starting to happen there’s a bunch of candles about the house here. First world problems, getting supplies and stuff.

item.title: Gingerbread Fingers
item.description: Took a walk through a forest, saw almost no one. Scrounging about town for bakeries and dessert.

item.title: The Earth Blushes in Flowers
item.description: Flower was an awesome video game.

item.title: Wear Sun Screen!
item.description: Since Summer is about to begin the ceremony is in. It’ll be a once in a lifetime opportunity, city streets are best not get isolated in.

item.title: Onion Skins Have Pigment
item.description: The machinery has been overheating a lot, good thing there’s an internal thermometer. It usually taps out at around 70 degrees celsius. Let’s paint some eggs!

item.title: Bzzt
item.description: Looking into alternative tech providers, spring cleaning!

item.title: Chlorophyll
item.description: Attempted homemade nutella with peanuts, cocoa powder and honey once. Bad idea, thumbs up for culinary disasters.

item.title: Seasons
item.description: Waking up to a foot of snow, untouched without visitors in the night. The end of winter is bitter and sweet since the animals are about and cold blistering hollow no more.

item.title: Workaholism
item.description: X-mas celebrations are coming to a close & waking up from a long hangover. Yes, it is January 31st and it’s dawning on everyone that life has to go on.

item.title: Logic
item.description: Completed a 1st logic network & almost ready to step into a new sculpture.
Happy New Year!

item.title: CC-0
item.description: Updated licensing info on music 4 videos.

item.title: Avalanche
item.description: If not for the absence of snow right now would be a-ok. Making deformations on a primate.

item.title: Acme
item.description: Comments have been removed on account of making website ugly.
Comms are up.

item.title: Test Phase Sum Up
item.description: Map clear, Starship launch at the ready.

item.title: Reference
item.description: From now on this here subset in recess has dedication outlined to keeping up to date on personal projects, w.i.ps and so on.

item.title: Site is Live!
item.description: Site is Live!
